lenders.name: Luly
lenders.loan_because: love to help..

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I have started a software company that helps businesses that create things save time & money.

lenders.name: Erin

lenders.occupational_info: I manage the messaging and educational resources marketing and communications for a non-profit dedicated to finding a cure for a cancer called GIST and helping those living with it until then.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: as an entrepreneur I sometimes need encouragement and inspiration, and there is no shortage of it here!
lenders.occupational_info: Alongside governments there are many of us working with science and society to balance the needs of today with those of tomorrow.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lenders.name: Ellen & Jillian
lenders.loan_because: it's a buzz to help others

lenders.name: Tara

lenders.occupational_info: I sell men's grooming products in a small family owned company

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am a buisness owner myself and know the hardships of starting and running a business on a day to day basis. This is this a great way to enpower another business owner and the paybacks can be rolled over and over to help many more.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell air pollution and water pollution control equipment to industrial customers

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I can put off buying that new ski suit for another year!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people heal their illnesses and pains with mainly the use of my hands.  I am interested in global health; both for the person and for the planet.

lenders.name: Seekers, 1st Readers
lenders.loan_because: The two groups wanted to donate money to a good cause and this one was recommended to us by a Church Member.
lenders.occupational_info:
First Friday Readers is the bookclub.  A groups of women who get together once a month to discuss the chosen book.
The Seekers Bible Study meets twice a month for Bible discussion.

lenders.name: Tania & Samir
lenders.loan_because: To promote trust and love across, political borders.
lenders.occupational_info:
She: (Pre-school teacher) Shapes the minds of young citizens at a very early age.
He: (Engineer) Develops clean, alternative energy solutions for the world.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I'm Fortunate enough to have it to loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Nothing comes without a price. Many need help to pay for it.

lenders.name: Valorie
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in the management of income and expenses at a marine terminal.

lenders.name: Lorena
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's better to enable someone to buy their own boat and fishing rod, than give them a single fish. It's an investment in the future of an individual, which flows through to their family, community, country, and eventually to the whole world.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: my life is rich from the gifts of others...and I want to share in the same way

lenders.name: Penelope & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people, who don't have the advantages that we had starting out.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of thoes who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software used in medical devices.

lenders.name: Allinee
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a faculty librarian at a community college on the West coast of the United States. 

I absolutely love working there and I think I am extremely lucky; my students are awesome. They keep me on my toes, occasionally toss me a stumper, and never fail to challenge my assumptions–for which I am grateful. They teach me as much as I teach them, I’m sure of it.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: My friend was kind enough to give me a gift certificate, so that I could help other people. I will keep this loan going, and hopefully add more money to it in the future, for as long as this site exists. It's a really amazing idea.

lenders.name: Jens
lenders.loan_because:
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
- Chinese Proverb
lenders.occupational_info: I'm on a mission to make technology work for people.

lenders.name: Sonia and Patrick
lenders.loan_because: .....because we can

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It works...
lenders.occupational_info: Paper pusher...

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school student in Oregon and I plan to pursue foreign affairs and language when I go to college.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have a good job and a good place to live.  I want others to have the same opportunities for a happy and satisfying life.
lenders.occupational_info: I issue contracts for services and purchase parts and materials for power plants.

lenders.name: Kiva
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students at the University of Virginia who meet biweekly to loan and raise awareness of microfinance.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: The best gift in the world is the gift of opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time student majoring in finance, accounting and minoring in business law. I am also an intern at Baldwin where I help people with make money with their money. I also teach hip-hop dancing at a dancing studio.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because God has blessed us, and I like to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Very enjoyable and interesting.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: FEESABIALLAH.. I am just one man.  But We (humanity) give so that others can recieve.  Money is a great test in this life.  So i hope that god can forgive us for where we are weak and reward us for where we are strong.
lenders.occupational_info: Well firstly, i work at being a better person. Secondly i study Islam. alhumduallah. Thirdly I am studying to become an attorney..

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It is fun.  It helps people.  It doesn't take a lot of money.  As a loan gets paid back, I loan it out again.  Just recycling the money.

lenders.name: Javier
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like to help entrepreneurs. As an entrepreneur myself I know how hard it is to do the first step. We all need financial, social and emotional help making the first step to financial freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I empowered people to fulfills their ultimate dreams.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: it's empowering!
lenders.occupational_info: marketing

lenders.name: sabine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing the blessings
lenders.occupational_info: I cook for a living

lenders.name: Franco
lenders.loan_because: we are mandated to serve!
lenders.occupational_info: to ease the suffering of people

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It helps me  feel like I've made some small difference.

lenders.name: Harue
lenders.loan_because:
I can feel  the world close.
I am so glad that I can be helpful for the borrower while being in my country.

lenders.name: Jesi and Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to understand compassion.  They choose the loans we make!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell houses

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: My contribution can make a difference.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.occupational_info: I work to raise money to fund an organization that empowers girls and women to make healthy choices.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Francois
lenders.loan_because:
It is a very good way to help those who  are willing to go out of poverty. We know exactly how it will benefit them and I wish them the best of luck. A small loan is very little effort that can change people's life. 
Congrats to Kiva people ;-)

lenders.name: Leeann
lenders.loan_because: I am a builder of community and want to contribute to the expansion of hope beyond my backyard.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate the employees that I work with so that they can do their jobs better.

lenders.name: Chika
lenders.loan_because: the money spent on beer could be better spent.
lenders.occupational_info: I make people in magazines look better than they really are...and make sure they don't look green or red or any color in the printing.

lenders.name: Stu
lenders.loan_because: Inspired by faith.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computer projects for a health insurance company.

lenders.name: Sublime Traveler
lenders.loan_because: God gives us everything and asks nothing in return, except that we give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell surveillance and counter-surveillance equipment such as hidden cameras and electronic bug detectors.

lenders.name: Cas
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting to help someone achieve financial independence. I travel often and this is a small way to say thanks for the many great experiences I've had around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I organise contemporary art exhibitions in a museum

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how important access to loans can be in enabling a business to succeed. Lending also gives me a chance to live my religious beliefs -- to value the inherent worth and dignity of all people, and to help others, both at home and throughout the world.

lenders.name: Karma
lenders.loan_because: I feel priveleged to have benefited from a great education and endless opportunities to support my entrepreneural dreams. I want to help provide opportunities for women less fortunate wherever possible. I spent several years living with my family in Lagos, Nigeria as a young child and I feel a connection to the people of Africa and want to do what I can to make their part of the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two careers that are quite different. Most of my income is from my work as a project manager in Corporate America. I am also a Massage therapist and I work to help clients who suffer from stress, chronic pain, and injuries. I keep busy with both jobs and I also have a 3 1/2 year old son who I adore.

lenders.name: Briar
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been blessed and for this I want to give back to those less fortunate. We all have a debt to pay!

lenders.name: Sammy
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel warm & fuzzy inside :)

lenders.name: Alex Caudill
lenders.loan_because: I've always had a ton of opportunities and I'd like to create some!
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs and create interactive websites for businesses

lenders.name: Nuala
lenders.loan_because: My experience as a working mother for almost 50 years (with six children and many grandchildren), is that people's creativity and energy is just waiting to be released. Kiva is one way to empower them.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and manage building projects in Ireland.

lenders.name: Katharina
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by the idea of making empowement of the poor more tangible through individualization and social capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to get insights on how social entrepreneurs attract resources to catalyze the the creation of social value

lenders.name: Ivana
lenders.loan_because: we all need a  help sometime, and we all can help sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to have nice and relaxing time when they are staying in my town, in hotel where I work,even maybe help them forget about their problems at least when I am arround them :)

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that would otherwise not qualify or have help available.
lenders.occupational_info: Business consulting and accounting services to small businesses and families.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in someones life.

lenders.name: Dick - Stacey - Ryan
lenders.loan_because: It gives us immense satisfaction helping someone achieve their goals and improve their life ...
lenders.occupational_info: After many years of working for ourselves we want to help others achieve their dreams and financial independence.

lenders.name: Anah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva.  I think that microfinancing is one of the best ways to address the massive imbalance in the global distribution of wealth and resources.  I appreciate the non-judgmental nature of the lending process, and I am especially invested in the way that the borrowers decide what their needs are and take action on their own behalf.  The autonomy and empowerment of the borrowers is so important to me.  I think this is one of the best ways to help those who have fewer resources and options shape and direct their lives while gaining economic security and success.
lenders.occupational_info: I write novels and short stories that are published either in books or for people to read on their computers.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because:
I want to.
 
Kiva has shown itself and its borrowers to be trustworthy and, to be honest, inspiring.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university supporting a supercomputer used to solve large problems such as protein folding, astrophysics, earthquakes and climate.

lenders.name: Jonathan & Ceinwen
lenders.loan_because: we believe that everyone should have the opportunity to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Jonathan works for a church in London and Ceinwen is a lawyer.

lenders.name: Malini
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people with the resources they need to make a difference in their own livelihoods because it impacts them, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Carolina
lenders.occupation: Owner of a Bed and Breakfast - North of Portugal
lenders.loan_because: Kiva deserves...
lenders.occupational_info:
It's an amazing experiency to know people all over the world. 

World is ours,  I want to do it better!

lenders.name: Corbie
lenders.loan_because: my entire life is about helping people cross the bridge from fear to fearlessness so that they can fly.   Fear and poverty often go hand in hand -- self sufficiency gives wings!
lenders.occupational_info: I guide people in their spiritual lives.  It is all about knowing that God is there for you, however you view Him.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to be successful, and it's so rewarding to watch the progress that Kiva enables.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: We should all ask ourselves about the fortuitous nature of being able to loan to those in less fortunate circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on problems related to coastal land loss in Louisiana and green design in land use.

lenders.name: Bettie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people see their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Chrissy
lenders.loan_because: the world is unjust, and we all need the opportunity to live the life we want to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students at an international school.  These kids are usually the children of the embassy employees here in Guatemala.  My students come from all over the world and I learn just as much about their culture as they learn about science from me.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it changes lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an artisanal cheesemaker in Arkansas, a small business owner, a foodie, an animal lover, a gardener, an engineer, a kind-heart, a coffee addict, and a Kiva lender.

lenders.name: Lifai
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help:
1. People who want to do something good but are unable to because of something so small 
2.  Change the world for the better
3.  Because I can not travel there and volunteer as much as I want to
lenders.occupational_info: I provide business and technology services within a corporation.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: This is a small way to help out.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: To whom much has been given, much will be required.

lenders.name: Melany Vorass
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Yolana
lenders.loan_because: A small offering can make a big change.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am able to

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little help sometime in our lives
lenders.occupational_info: My Business was in the Canary. islands working with Tourists,and was very enjoyable.

lenders.name: Rifki Afrigh
lenders.loan_because:
i lost my money, someone steal it,,,
i need to pay my school,,,
i really need in hurry,,,
i'll give the money back as soon as possible,,, 
for someone who has a lot of money, please help me,,,,
i need $3000,,,
Thank you so much,,,

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in the lives of people in distant lands, whose struggles are so much more difficult than mine, by giving them a HAND UP as opposed to a handout, which often creates a temporary fix.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Helping each other is an easy way to make this world a better place - for us and more importantly for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: My passion is baking food for people to enjoy and share together.

lenders.name: Marcos Raùl Ramos
lenders.occupation: Tecnico Superior y profesor. en Seg.y Med.Amb.Lab.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need that are trying to make their homes a better place to live. People that work hard for so little deserve help from those who have the means.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell jewelry on the internet. People from all around the world are able to purchase from me!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe very strongly in the power of the entrepreneur and the role micro financing plays in helping people improve their lives. I'm so happy KIVA is here to allow me to make a real difference.

lenders.name: Alister
lenders.loan_because: I want to buy a small   Land about 4000 acres to make a small Oil Palm Plantation and the price is USD250,000.00
lenders.occupational_info: I need Help to get a Loan from  Kiva across all over the  World USD250000.00.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I are both entrepreneurs but we are fortunate enough to live in a country that has given us so many opportunities, education and freedom.  We want to extend a bit of that freedom to other entrepreneurs around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help leaders in organizations to learn the skills they need to manage themselves and their teams to perform their best.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: my mother raised me to believe that the world is a better place when women help other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international television news agency

lenders.name: Rubicon South
lenders.loan_because: The world just needs a little helping hand.

lenders.name: Kudrat
lenders.loan_because: It is in my hands to make a difference.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help out!

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I have been involved in development, and Micro loans for entrepreneurs, and found out about Kiva through word of mouth., and so far have been very impressed.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been in management most of my life, in black Africa, India and Switzerland. Recently I was involved in a technological aspect of micro finance using mobile phones, as well as a consultant for "one up" in size on micro credit loaned to entrepreneurs in East Africa ( average size of loans around 10'000$.)

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a practical way to make a difference for families in poverty.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a mental health clinic

lenders.name: PB Middle School
lenders.loan_because: We want to make our world a better place. Fighting poverty and supporting human ingenuity, community health projects, service to others and projects that make our environments healthier, safer and more peaceful are important to us at Pacific Beach Middle School.
lenders.occupational_info: Builders Club is one of the many clubs at Pacific Beach Middle: An International Baccalaureate World School. Our club sponsors the loans for the school as part of our commitment to better local and global communities through service.

lenders.name: Marin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: marjorie and josie
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: marjorie is a writer and josie is in first grade.

lenders.name: brigitte
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mum; I know how important it is for people to have an income.  I am very lucky to live in a wealthy part of the world.

lenders.name: Bobbi
lenders.loan_because: Helping others help themselves through loans is, in my mind, better than giving to charity.  I know that when I've been given money, I don't appreciate it as much as when I've worked to earn it. It means more when someone else has confidence in you to repay a loan,  than when they give you money out of pity.
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver the mail, it's a wonderful job because I get to be outside and most people are happy to see me :)

lenders.name: Reto
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people to get sth going.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is my duty as a person born into the richest country in the world to help the less fortunate. No one can choose where they will come into the world and if you just happen to be born in Africa or South America you shouldn't have less rights or privileges than anyone else.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: As a Peace Corps volunteer in West Africa in the early 1980s I saw how much alike we all are as human beings and how much just a little help at the right time could improve people's lives. I love the idea of helping others directly without the intermediary of banks.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is currently in transition! For the past 15 years I have worked as editor at the office of Arid Lands Studies at the University of Arizona. But, due to funding cuts I will be looking for new work soon. It's scary and exciting at the same time. Maybe some of you would like to look at the web site of the online journal I edited for the past 12 years, the Arid Lands Newsletter; the URL is below.

lenders.name: Emma Cowan
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other.

lenders.name: Sawyer
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people!

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to assist others to realize the joy and freedom that comes from being able to sustain a decent lifestyle for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Information Technology in Healthcare.  And I draw and paint as often as I can.

lenders.name: Elsbeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe I have a responsibility to help when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make art, keep honeybees and hens, grow organic food and teach

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance.  What an extraordinary idea to allow people to take a very small amount of money and use it over and over to help people worldwide make a better life for themselves and their families.  I hope to be able to make a positive difference in people's lives, a little at a time, all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in IT at one of the studios in "Hollywood" where we produce and sell movies and television programs globally. I am extraordinarily lucky to have all that I have in this world and want to help others, especially female entrepreneurs, get ahead.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help jump start people who just need a small loan to get them going in their buisness.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I like to enable people to help themselves.  Sometimes we all need a hand to get going.

lenders.name: Nikhil
lenders.loan_because: I want to create and open doors of opportunities like others did for me

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize volunteer activities for employees at my company. I also help to manage and distribute our company donations to the community.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the right to a better life and that those who are trying shouldn't be penalized because of their place of birth.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student obtaining my Bachelor of Science degree in Public and Non Profit Administration.

lenders.name: Dario
lenders.loan_because: When I fist started my business it was very hard for me to get a loan to grow my business so I know how it feels to want to buy more inventory or equipment and not be able to get the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy a product make it better and sell it for a huge profit

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Have and give.
lenders.occupational_info: I teacher grade nine (all subjects) in a small rural town.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: people need help to get their business growing and/or improve their lives.  small amount of $$ makes a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an online retailer

lenders.name: Jacqui & Donna
lenders.loan_because: Because it only takes one person to change the world
lenders.occupational_info: Jacqui plays in a rock band and works cutting lawns and doing gardening during the day. Donna works helping unemployed people find sustainable work. On the weekends we are learning to paint.

lenders.name: E.D.U.C.A.T.E.
lenders.occupation: Homeschoolers from the Greater Kansas City Area
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
E.D.U.C.A.T.E.
Excellence, Diversity, Unity, Community, 
Acceptance and Tolerance in Education

EDUCATE is a circle of families who are currently homeschooling for educational reasons in Johnson County, Kansas. We provide one another with a network that can provide support, educational, and social opportunities. We share the belief that learning occurs at all ages and in a variety of ways.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I am honored to be able to give back by investing in someone's future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director of a nonprofit that is working to ensure access to legal assistance for low-income families, children, and persons with disabilities.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The US economy was founded by entrepreneurs. People are inspired to take risks, to grow, to fail and succeed, to learn, so often it only takes a little bit to help some one get started.  Thanks, Donna for showing me Kiva.  The folks who believed in me Peter, Virginia, Fips, Pomfret & Brown University
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional money manager.  People hire me to watch over and grow the money they have saved for investments.

lenders.name: Epiphany
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it!  Helping others makes me feel all warm and toasty inside, but I'm kind of broke.  It's great that after a loan is repaid, it can be disbursed to someone else... and in this way, the borrowers kind of help one another.  A small amount can go a long way.   Also, honestly, I otherwise would probably be wasting my money on unnecessary crap on eBay if it weren't for these cool Kiva people..
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a university student, which consists of studying a lot, walking or biking everywhere, and (obviously) playing a lot of Tetris.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: It is my privilege to share my good fortunes with those who struggle daily to make ends meet.
lenders.occupational_info: My job consists of very physically demanding work and at times high amounts of stress and uncertainty. However,at the end of the day I have a clear conscience and a deep feeling of satisfaction.

lenders.name: Priya
lenders.loan_because: it's the gift that keeps on giving.

lenders.name: Bridgett
lenders.loan_because: so many people in the world already have the spirit but just need the start.
lenders.occupational_info: bringing people closer to their inner divinity

lenders.name: Missy
lenders.loan_because: I CARE
lenders.occupational_info: Nursing is an International profession.

lenders.name: miles
lenders.loan_because: I have been all over the world and mostly to developing countries and I´ve seen the hard working people who can use a break to get ahead in this world
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pro athlete that happens to be on skis.  I ski for photographers and they get the photos published in magazines.  I am also a mountain guide and I take clients to the top of mountains all over the world including Mt. Mckinley, Aconcagua, Kilimajaro and more.

lenders.name: Eva Marie
lenders.loan_because: It makes so much sense and combining the efforts of like minded people means that we can make a meaningful difference in lives, one by one
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who manage other people's money do the right thing for their investors

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of the world community coming together to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm married 19 years, with two great kids (even though they're teenagers!) I design logos for the local kayak guide to catalogs for the Metropolitan Opera and annual reports for companies like Foot Locker and AIG.

lenders.name: Bek
lenders.loan_because: My friend gave me a gift certificate for my birthday, but also I love this idea.  I think it's fantastic to be helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a University and my role is to assist in the development and implimentation of Flexible Learning.  Which basically means a different way of getting information to students - not just face to face.

lenders.name: soundbyte
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business with nothing, and I appreciate the drive and ambition that these business people must have to overcome such amazing odds.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a number of diverse businesses, including soundbyte -- a computer & musical instrument retail store.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what God has blessed me with.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an ambulance to help people who are hurt in their homes or on the street

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: My friend gave me a gift certificate. But after reading everybody's stories, I will add more money of my own!
lenders.occupational_info: I write for magazines and travel guides.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.occupational_info: I laze around the house and sleep approximately 23 hours a day. The other hour  I spend being a pest and annoying people.

lenders.name: Chad & Melissa Wiebesick
lenders.occupation: Chad is a marketer and Melissa is a social worker.
lenders.loan_because:
Chad and Melissa Wiebesick are both social activists. They want to lend a helping hand in making the world a greater place. Kiva makes it a greater place. Using Kiva to lend to the world's working poor makes a lasting change. And a tangible change. They'd rather lend money to people who need it than have it sit in their bank. 

They enjoy visiting other countries and have travelled to Belize, Bahamas, Cayman Islands, Honduras, and Mexico (Ensenada and Cozumel). Chad has lived in nearly half the world's continents. He's been an expatriate twice -- living four years in Germany and five years in South Korea. He’s an avid globetrotter and has visited Austria, Belgium, Berlin (East and West), Canada, Denmark, England, France, Holland, Italy, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and Russia (Moscow and Leningrad).  He still hasn't satiated his wanderlust.
lenders.occupational_info:
Chad works in advertising. He helps companies promote their products. 
Melissa is a social worker. She helps people in need and solves social problems.

lenders.name: richard
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.  We are all part of the same family, and family should help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to improve the level of service offered to our customers.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I feel so incredibly fortunate in my life that I've been able to follow my own path, mostly undeterred. A lot of that has to do with the passion I have for what I do, but also because of the sacrifices made by friends and family alike who have shown me nothing but support and love. Every chance to give back to the world is a chance that must be taken.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically, music is every capacity.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I care about people all around the world and I never want to take my blessings for granted. I believe to whom much is given, much is also required, and I give to the glory of God.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a journalist. I travel to take photos and write stories about things that are going on around the world, so I have seen some interesting countries and met wonderful people.

lenders.name: Laimi
lenders.loan_because: i want to start buying closthes from South AFrica and sell in my country.. i look after amm my sibblings and its not easy with the salary i earn.
lenders.occupational_info: im a personal assistnat tot he CEO and i help vulnerable kids in the street

lenders.name: James and JoAnne
lenders.loan_because: To help those who need is what God wants from each of us.
lenders.occupational_info: James advises businesses on security matters. JoAnne has a small antique business

lenders.name: Mobilee
lenders.loan_because: We are a consultancy firm in The Netherlands. We are happy to share a part of our profits with entrepeneurs in other countries. We hope that some of our contributions will lead to a better life for entrepeneurs and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultancy, project management, interim management.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: The amount of my loan is small to me but it makes a huge difference to someone else. I admire those who can take charge of their own life and if I can help someone to do that, then it gives me great pleasure.

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: as a banker, I understand the significance of credit. I much prefer loaning money to people in need to just plain giving it to them. This to me is a question of human dignity, but it does not prevent me from giving to charitable purposes additionally.

lenders.name: Jefficus
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to do something to help themselves seems so much more useful than just giving money to old-fashioned organizations and hoping they use it wisely.
lenders.occupational_info: I invent new ways for computers to help people be more creative and expressive.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.occupational_info:
http://pedropolonio.weebly.com
http://club-silencio.blogspot.com

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. I may not be rich but I can give on some level and this setting allows that to happen. My goal is to spread the word and share the fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a residential supervisor for a facility that intakes children that have been removed from their families homes and are awaiting a semi-permanent placement.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: They really really need it.

lenders.name: Vijay
lenders.loan_because: Whenever possible-I like to give
lenders.occupational_info: Multi-faceted

lenders.name: Ashlie
lenders.loan_because: my boyfriend gave me a kiva credit for my birthday when we first started dating!
lenders.occupational_info: i sell medicines to doctors who specialize in psychiatry and pain management.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I make the lives of our two dogs, Gabee and Baxter, happy in every way!

lenders.name: Mike McGraw
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Christoph Marloh
lenders.loan_because:
I wish you a Happy New Year 2014 and lots of energy, love, and may your wishes come true.

"If you look to others for fulfillment, you will never be fulfilled. If your happiness depends on money, you will never be happy with yourself. Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the world belongs to you." —Lao Tzu
lenders.occupational_info:
Vision to value. 
Details: http://www.gb24fonds.com/html/grundbesitz24/management.html

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial Insurance

lenders.name: Justice
lenders.loan_because: I want to increase the items that I sell in my Bar
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small drinking bar where I sell soft drinks and wine.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: fortunately, I have the means to do so.  It feels great to help others realize their goals.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Kiva fosters the needs of those seeking financial assistance, alongside those who are willing and able to provide it. It's a simple concept, yet far reaching, and I believe in helping those who are attempting to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I co-own a private equity firm (InvestAC, LLC) that is focused on providing capital for unique and alternative investment opportunities, with an emphasis in real estate and undervalued companies. My company's mission is to deliver superior returns to investors with mitigated risk through premier access to top investment opportunities, by way of a proven investment strategy and disciplined process.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I had read about microlending previously, but never thought about getting involved until a friend showed me the kiva site. I like the fact that I can help people around the world grow their businesses and make better lives for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy and immediate way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: It's impossible to really improve our situations without the ability to borrow money.  I've been given the chance; now it's my pleasure to help others have an opportunity.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to be a lender!  I love the idea of being able to help other women start and maintain their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in and manage residential property.  I own 20 apartments in the Washington, DC area.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stroke survivor who wants to help someone in need.  I heard about your need in BIll Clinton's book and on TV.  I hope my contribution can help.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's interesting, fun and helps people

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am in a position to help others now.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been teaching 3 and 4 year olds in  international schools around the world.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I have always believed in enabling people to better themselves.  In my view, life isn't about where you end up, but rather what you did to get there.

lenders.name: Arne
lenders.loan_because: It probably helps..

lenders.name: Jean-Francois Noel
lenders.occupational_info: Creating website. Like this hotel booking site http://www.seeyourhotel.com. The easiest way to see where you'll stay.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We are all a part of the Whole ; not to loan is like depriving a part of one's own family of their share of what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: Working internationally via computer and telephone links.

lenders.name: Almira
lenders.occupation: Retired, volunteer children\'s story reader, yoga t

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I love uniting with people across the globe in funding the future of someone less fortunate than myself. I believe in making a small ripple that can affect many.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: The idea started as one of my Lenten activities but now I feel inspired by how it helps people improve their own lives.  Also, it's a loan that keeps on lending and that is so cool!

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and want to help others.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an amazing way to by-pass all the governments and government agencies. It's people to to people assistance at it's finest.

lenders.name: Nyla
lenders.loan_because: It is kind.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 21/2 year old girl.  My sister helps me choose people to donate to.

lenders.name: seOverflow
lenders.loan_because: because I want others to be able to achieve their business goals

lenders.name: anahi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who have less then you. I believe in people who want a better way of life and fulfilling their dreams and their families dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Financial organization in the Community department. We run a peer lending program which I am involved in and support.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the best way to achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: For years I practiced anesthesia (I put patients to sleep for surgery) but I am now mostly retired.  I recently traveled to Tanzania to help teach health care professionals about Palliative Care.  I learned as much from the participants as they did from the "teachers".

lenders.name: Clint
lenders.loan_because: After all that is said and done, what will matter to us before we die is the impact we had on others.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: No one can be free until everyone is free

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I'm really interested in other cultures and the way people live and I know that it's not that easy for people in other countires to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to high school in a one room school house with 8 other kids, so I know what it's like to live in a rural environment.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: a small donation can make a BIG difference in the life of an entrepreneur!  Its an AWESOME concept!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I am all ready the person my friends come to for money, so why not add a few more people I don't know to the list.
lenders.occupational_info: do you watch video on-line?  I built tools to make that stuff work.

lenders.name: Kim Noland, eCrafty.com
lenders.loan_because: This is a beautifully simple way to impact lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother who started my own business 13 years ago. Now I hire other mothers to help me. I get to spend time with my children and work at what I love. My favorite days are every day. We sell beads and craft supplies from around the world.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Source, setup and support software for small businesses.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I believe that to better the world we must give everyone a fair shot at supporting themselves and their societies. I hope some day to be helping those people more directly, but for now, I am more than happy to lend as much as I can. Best wishes to all!

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I have so much compared to how little so many other women in the world have. I want to share what I have and help women prosper in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired in August 2007 as a consultant for the largest benefits consulting firm in the world, Mercer. My work there was very rewarding and now I have the opportunity for others to have the same experience.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because I love helping others.  I want to thank Kiva for giving me this opportunity to give a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I write at a computer, seven hours a day.  I have to analyze situations and write about them.

lenders.name: Donna and Juliet
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to understand the positive impact that a single person can have on the world.

lenders.name: Werner
lenders.loan_because: it is something small for me, but it makes a big difference in other people's lives.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I've been given so much.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I support technology for people so that they can do their jobs.

lenders.name: Edvard
lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute so people can take advantage of their opportunities.

lenders.name: David & Laura
lenders.loan_because: we can share our lives with other people in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies about packaging machines.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: People are worse off than me and need help.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am enjoying being retired.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this together...what goes around, comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to bring computers and people together ;-) ...

lenders.name: omer and rachel
lenders.loan_because: it seems worthwhile.

lenders.name: Karin & Mike
lenders.loan_because: Each of us CAN make a difference.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in compassion, and the free market. Capitalism and private charities have lifted billions out of poverty.

lenders.name: Della
lenders.loan_because: I can,  and no one should be denied the help they need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a passenger ferry,  in the food services, I also provide first aid to passengers and crew.

lenders.name: Matt & Patti
lenders.loan_because: We can, and it is a pleasure to help people who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Kaia
lenders.loan_because: People have to get started somehow.  If you have a dream, you deserve a chance to realize it.
lenders.occupational_info: Human Resources, IT, Operations, Logistics, Accounts Receivables and Accounts Payables.

lenders.name: Niki
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people direct access to funds to promote their well-being.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze environmental issues for large public infrastructure projects (roads, bridges, ports, parks) and document them in reports so that the public knows the environmental impacts associated with the project.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I believe in giving people an opportunity to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student, working part time while going to school.

lenders.name: Fabio
lenders.loan_because: I know by experience how difficult things can be when you want to have a better live for yourself or your family and you know that you have the talet and you know in your soul that you can work hard to pursue it but at the same time you cannot find anyone to trust in you, to believe in you......sometimes people just need a little hand to stand up and change their lives and through Kiva i think this is my chance to give a hand to this people and hopefuly make their lives better.

lenders.name: jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I am able to at the time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a residential housekeeper.

lenders.name: amy
lenders.loan_because: Sharing feels right. I work hard and it feels good to know that I am appreciated and successful. I want to help others work hard and achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my patients manage their pain and disability.

lenders.name: MR WEEKS
lenders.loan_because: i want my students to appreciate the power of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: a labor of love

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.occupational_info: I make small clay teddy bears.

lenders.name: Reece
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the ability to give to people who are in need. If i can help someone, i will.
lenders.occupational_info: I make advertisements

lenders.name: Dr. Anthony W. Antolic
lenders.occupation: I write childrens books as well as cultural studies about the nature of humanity.
lenders.loan_because: I feel that making these is a great way to give back to God's people. I don't believe in tithing to a church, on account of the corruption I have seen with in the churches I have visited. However, the people of God's kingdom still need to be tended too.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories to children, and I draw pictures to help tell those stories. I feel the best story ever told is the one not yet written.

lenders.name: Ejay
lenders.loan_because: I want my brothers and sisters in Africa to be successful
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business student

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: to empower other women

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have tried investing in big business. I am very unhappy with it.
lenders.occupational_info: Once I had thirty different jobs in one year!

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of getting the opportunity to help someone out.

lenders.name: Twila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in other people's lives.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I feel everybody can be successful with hard work and a little financial assistance.

lenders.name: pushparaj
lenders.loan_because: i need maoney for my medication i m alone n handicapted so plz lone men i need 1000$for itu can give this to my paypal acc
lenders.occupational_info: i do any kind of work for living help me

lenders.name: Rhonda Joy
lenders.loan_because: it makes my heart smile :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am incredibly blessed...From my heart to yours; share the love and blessings!

lenders.name: Raghav
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance. I have been blessed enough that I have most of the things I need and in a position to help others. I feel that if most of the people out there are given a chance and resources they require, they would do a much better job than what I'm doing and would be able to change the world and make this place a much better one then what it is today..
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Insurance Broker working for a Lloyd's of London Broker. At the same time I also act as in-house Risk Manager for a large offshore Drilling Contractor

lenders.name: Gabriela
lenders.loan_because: The future of our society depends on what we do in the present.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I know the challenges facing people in rural areas and I like innovative ways of reaching between people. This is a way for me to see the impact on one individual, which isn't always so obvious with entire projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage programs for a NGO that implements health projects in northern Vietnam (Cao Bang Province).

lenders.name: Mez & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We love to share what we have, to give others a chance to have the life we have!
lenders.occupational_info: A work in progress, always!

lenders.name: Oceans of Opportunity
lenders.loan_because: Working in some of the most remote corners of the planet, I have a selfless appreciation for the numerous hardworking individuals and families that are not reached by  westernized resources, including access to capital. I believe that it is a our social responsibility, as visitors, environmentalists, and explorers of these areas to support the local economies and developing infrastructure by any means possible. The investment potential of these areas provides opportunities at a microscale which is often not realistic in more developed economies, yet is no less profitable; all while doing good for communities and economies in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an environmental, ocean, and exploration advocate undertaking numerous microventures to develop our grassroots organization, Ocean Opportunity.

lenders.name: Tammie
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the difficult situation of others.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with the opportunity to help. This idea is simply fantastic
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm blessed with an exciting job in which I meet all kind of people every day. 
I work and travel abroad as often as possible. I like to keep myself updated about what's going on in this rough World.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I've worked on remittances and microfinance for years in multilateral institutions and I think it is amazing to also be able to loan directly.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because:
I hope to help make the world a better place - but not just for myself! 
Being self-employed, I know how useful even the smallest help can be.

lenders.name: The Mother of Chili
lenders.loan_because: I give a shit.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in life and would like to help others.

lenders.name: Paul and Janis
lenders.loan_because: We hope to make a positive impact on the lives of others.  Jesus Christ loves all of us unconditionally, and calls us to love one another in the same way.  We hope this loan shows that we care about you and want you to succeed.  God Bless!

lenders.name: Sarah Weaver
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Joline
lenders.loan_because: It is the most affordable way I can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Fourth year of my Bachelor of Social Work

lenders.name: julia
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference, and its important to do so when I can. When people stand up to make their lives better, I am proud to offer what support I have available
lenders.occupational_info: Quality Assurance is the job of making sure people provide help and assistance to our customers,

lenders.name: Marjie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and design books.

lenders.name: Quia
lenders.loan_because: I was a giving and loving person in life and now my friends will keep on giving in my memory.

lenders.name: MrsHapaPake
lenders.loan_because: I "Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege."

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I understand how important credit can be to small business owners and I want to give them the chance to grow and improve their businesses in order to provide income for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work together with clients in New York City to provide them with small business loans to help develop and/or grow their businesses.  My job is to lend money exactly as Kiva partners do, but in the New York City  area.
